name: Xcel Infiniti Round Toe 8mm Boots - Unisex
description: Skip the “brrr” as you paddle out on cold weather surf sessions. These boots have a Thermolite IR lining and 8mm neoprene that promise comfort and warmth in water temperatures 7˚C and even a little below. A single rubber on the bottom keeps the sensitivity between your feet and your board intact.8mm neoprene provides insulation for the coldest days. Recommended for water temperatures of 7˚C and below.Plush liner dries quickly between sessions.Pull up ankle loop makes for easy entry.Molded instep strap provides a secure fit.Hidden seams are taped for added durability.Single-layer rubber sole helps you feel your board underfoot.
